result.execSummary:
The defendant Arron Cornelius Bowens was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Arron Cornelius Bowens is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Arron Cornelius Bowens was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).
  • Arron Cornelius Bowens was found guilty of Battery [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Court ordered all NON MANDATORY court costs, fees, and surcharges waived.
Consecutive to: This is a TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.

supervisions.descr: House of Correction - Imposed and Stayed

miscConds.notes: Pay all MANDATORY court costs, fees, and surcharges including: DNA and DV surcharges during period of probation, failure to pay will result in a civil judgment. Court ordered NON MANDATORY court costs, fees, and surcharges waived.

No contact with firearms.
Court advised due to DV conviction under federal law the defendant is prohibited from firearm possession.

No contact with the victim unless approved by the agent or court. Third party contact is granted for time with child.
Court advised defendant of penalties for violation of NO CONTACT ORDER.

Batterers intervention program.
Parenting classes.
Treatment and/or counseling as determined by agent.

Absolute sobriety.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Arron Cornelius Bowens

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Arron Cornelius Bowens not in court. Attorney Christian Eichenlaub appeared.  Benjamin Calvin Verhulst appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
cab
No appearance by the Department of Correction.
The defender is in absconder status.  The court will not issue a commitment at this time.  The agent can bring it in on a later date if the department does not revoke him.
Bail Refund Check packet
Bail Notice mailed to surety.

Sentencing Proceeded. Statements by parties and defendant.

AS TO COUNT 1
Court ordered 71 DAYS in the House of Correction, consecutive, this is a TIME SERVED DISPOSITION. Court ordered all MANDATORY court costs, fees, and surcharges, including DNA and DV surcharges, to be paid during probation period on count 2, otherwise a civil judgment will be entered. Court ordered all NON MANDATORY court costs, fees, and surcharges waived.

AS TO COUNT 2
The court sentenced the defendant to 9 MONTHS in the House of Correction, consecutive, straight time.  Court STAYED sentence and placed defendant on PROBATION for 24 MONTHS.

CONDITIONS OF PROBATION
-Serve 30 DAYS in the House of Correction as Condition Time, STAYED pending review.
-Batterers Intervention program.
-Parenting classes.
-AODA assessment, comply with recommended treatment.
-Absolute sobriety.
-Treatment and/or counseling as determined by agent.
-No contact with victim unless approved by the agent or court. Third party contact is granted for time with the child.
-Obtain/maintain employment.
-No contact with firearms.
-Pay all MANDATORY court costs, fees, and surcharges including: DNA and DV surcharges during period of probation, failure to pay will result in a civil judgment. Court ordered all NON MANDATORY court costs, fees, and surcharges waived.

*Court ordered defendant to report to room 511 in the Courthouse no later than 12:00PM on 3/9/2015.
*Court advised defendant of right to seek post conviction relief. 
*Court advised defendant of penalties for violation of NO CONTACT ORDER.
*Court advised due to DV conviction under federal law the defendant is prohibited from firearm possession.

Filed: 
-Pretrial Sentence Credit
-Notice of Right to Seek Post-Conviction Relief
-Memorandum of Conditions of Probation

AS TO COUNT 1 AND 2
Defendant changes plea(s) to GUILTY. Defendant examined as to plea, advised of Constitutional Rights and the maximum penalties. Court found that the defendant knowingly, voluntarily and intelligently waived rights.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights form, received and filed. Parties stipulate to the Criminal Complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea(s).  Court found defendant GUILTY and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record.  

AS TO COUNT 3
Pursuant to plea negotiations, on motion of the state, court ordered count 3 Dismissed, But Read In. 

Court ordered Jury Trial on 3/16/2015 at 8:30 am vacated.

Defendant Arron Cornelius Bowens in court with attorney Eugene J. Dietzler.  Defendant Arron Cornelius Bowens in custody.  Benjamin Lindsay appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Parties have reached a resolution.

AS TO COUNT 1
On motion of the State, Court ordered charge amended to Disorderly Conduct, Domestic Abuse, contrary to Wisconsin Statutes section(s) 947.01(1) and 968.075(1)(a), a Class B Misdemeanor. 

AS TO COUNT 2
On motion of the State, Court ordered charge amended to Battery, Domestic Abuse, contrary to Wisconsin Statutes section(s) 940.19(1) and 968.075(1)(a), a Class A Misdemeanor.  Probation Review Hearing scheduled for August 7, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Eugene J. Dietzler in court, defendant Arron Cornelius Bowens not in court, in custody.  Benjamin Lindsay appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant NOT produced. Case heard off the record. Parties requests an adjourned Pleah Hearing. Neither party requests to address the court on the record. Signed, Filed & Distributed, Agreed Upon Request for A New Court Date form. All conditions of bail remain in effect. Case adjourned for Pleah Hearing to branch 23.  Plea hearing scheduled for March 4, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Arron Cornelius Bowens in court with attorney Eugene J. Dietzler.  Defendant Arron Cornelius Bowens in custody.  Benjamin Lindsay appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Discussions held in chambers, conversation placed on the record. Defendant waived speedy trial time limits. Parties working toward resolution. Court ordered any amended information filed at Plea Hearing. Case adjourned for Plea Hearing and Jury Trial.  Plea hearing scheduled for February 26, 2015 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for March 16, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Arron Cornelius Bowens in court with attorney Eugene J. Dietzler.  Defendant Arron Cornelius Bowens in custody.  Michael Thurston appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CASE CALLED AT 1:30 P.M.  Arguments from state and defense counsel as to filings by parties. For reasons placed on the record, court stayed decision til date of trial. Case remains set for Jury Trial in branch 23 on 02/09/2015.
Case set for Motion Hearing at reqeust of State. Case set for 12/29/2014 at 8:30 am in branch 23.
Received & Filed, Motion To Admit Victim's Statements Under the Forfeiture By Wrongdoing Doctrine.

Defendant Arron Cornelius Bowens in court with attorney Eugene J. Dietzler.  Defendant Arron Cornelius Bowens in custody.  Michael Davis Thurston appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court reviewed defense motion to sever joined cases, argued, and DENIED for reasons place on the record. Defense counsel requested case be adjourned to allow for time to prepare for trial. Defendant WAIVED Speedy Trial Demand until next court date. Case adjourned to branch 23.  Jury trial scheduled for February 9, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Case set for Motion Hearing at defense counsel's request. Defendant to be produced. Case set for Motion Hearing on 10/31/2014 at 8:30 am in branch 23.

Signed & Filed, Order Modifying Restrictions on Defendant: The court order issued by this COurt on August 15, 2014 completely rescinding the defendant's telephone, visitation, and U.S. Mail Privileges be modified to allow two visits from Ms. Shamba Joseph to allow defendant to prepare for trial.
Received & Filed, Defendant's Objection to the Consolidation of cases.

Defendant Arron Cornelius Bowens in court with attorney Eugene J. Dietzler.  Defendant Arron Cornelius Bowens in custody.  Michael Davis Thurston appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case set for Status Conference with pending matter set for Preliminary Hearing. Case joined for trial with 14CF4253. Defense has 10 DAYS to file objection. Discussion regarding scheduling. Court reinstated vacated Jury Trail date. Both cases set for Jury Trial. Court ordered case adjourned to Branch 23. Court modified communication restrictions to allow for two in person contacts if order is provided to the court.  Jury trial scheduled for November 3, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Arron Cornelius Bowens in court with attorney Eugene J. Dietzler.  Defendant Aaron Cornelius Bowens in custody.  Michael Davis Thurston appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Final Pretrial not held. Defense request adjournment of Final Pretrial & Jury Trial date. Case adjourned to branch 23 for Status Conference to allow new charges to be processed. State's offer has been revoked. Case adjourned to branch 23.  Status conference scheduled for October 7, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Arron Cornelius Bowens in court with attorney Eugene J. Dietzler.  Defendant Arron Cornelius Bowens in custody.  Matthew G. Puthukulam appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court held in chambers conversation with both parties. For reasons placed on the record the court Ordered: Defendant's Telephone, Visitation, and U.S. Mail Custody Privileges. Order, signed, distributed, and filed.  Defendant enters a SPEEDY TRIAL DEMAND.  Defense counsel requests case be set for Final Pretrial & Jury Trial.  All conditions of bail remain in effect. Case adjourned for Final Pretrial & Jury Trial to branch 23.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 24, 2014 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for November 3, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Arron Cornelius Bowens in court with attorney Eugene J. Dietzler.  Defendant Arron Cornelius Bowens in custody.  Matthew Puthukulam appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case set for Status Conference, defendant produced. Attorney Dietzler recently appointed. State updated the court as to further investigation. For reasons placed on the record by the state, the court adjourned matter to allow state to continue investigation. State has until 8/15/2014 to compete additional investigation of this matter. Case adjourned to branch 23.  Motion hearing scheduled for August 15, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Court addressed bail on this case following new case being issued. Arguments from both parties. Court set bail in the amount of $7,500.00 CASH with turnover to Justice Point all conditions remain in effect.

Defendant Arron Cornelius Bowens in court with attorney Richard Henry Hart.  Defendant Arron Cornelius Bowens in custody.  Matthew G. Puthukulam appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case Recalled. Defendant produced from the House of Correction. Case set for Jury Trial. For reasons placed on the record court will allow the defense Alibi witness. Defense counsel requests an adjournment of the Jury Trial date, DENIED. 

MOTION TO WITHDRAW
Attorney Hart advised court there has been a breakdown in communication between himself and the defendant and requests to withdraw as  counsel. Court held colloquy with defendant. Court GRANTED withdraw as counsel. Case adjourned for Status of Counsel date in branch 23.
records.descr: Motion and order for withdrawal of counsel

records.addlTxt: Attorney Richard Henry Hart in court, defendant Arron Cornelius Bowens not in court, in custody.  Matthew Puthukulam appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Parties ready to proceed to trial. All conditions of bail remain in effect. Received & Filed, State's witness list and State's motion in Limine. Received & Filed, Defendant's Witness List, Defendant's Proposed Jury Instructions, and Cover Letter.

Attorney Richard H. Hart in court, defendant Arron Cornelius Bowens not in court, in custody.  Matthew G. Puthukulam appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant NOT produced. Jury trial scheduled for July 23, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Received & Filed, Justice Point Report.
Received & Filed, Cover Letter & Defendant's Preliminary Motions In Limine and Pretrial Motions.
Case Recalled, same appearances. Partis stipulate to having case heard at 1:30 pm on 4/8/2014 instead of 8:30 am in branch 23.

Defendant Arron Cornelius Bowens in court with attorney Richard H. Hart.  Matthew G. Puthukulam appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case set for Preliminary Hearing. Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing. Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver, received and filed. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial before Judge Grady, Branch 23. Original Information, received and filed. Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading. Defendant plead not guilty. Court ordered case adjourned to Branch 23.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 8, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Received & Filed, Justice Point Report.
14RM015316  Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff: 3/15/14

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY  to be monitored by drug testing and portable breathalyzers.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Kameo J; Lillie N or Adonis C

Defendant Arron Cornelius Bowens in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Arron Cornelius Bowens in custody.  Lucy J. Kronforst appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Grady, Branch 23. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  Defense entered a plea of NOT GUILTY as to Counts 1 & 2.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 21, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
Arrest Warrant received from the D.A.'s office on filing date of Criminal Complaint.
